00066     void GraphicsManager::Construct(const Whole &Width_, const Whole &Height_, const bool &FullScreen_ )
00067     {
00068         this->FrameDelay = 0;
00069         this->Fullscreen = FullScreen_;
00070         this->RenderHeight = Height_;
00071         this->RenderWidth = Width_;
00072         this->Priority = 0;
00073     }

00123     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00124     //Shows the ogre settings Dialog, and allows it to save settings to ogres
00125     //preset save location
00126     bool GraphicsManager::ShowGraphicsSettingDialog()
00127     {
00128         try
00129         {
00130             return this->GameWorld->OgreRoot->showConfigDialog();
00131         } catch (exception& e) {
00132             this->GameWorld->Log("Ogre settings windows from main UI or mandatory setting failure");
00133             this->GameWorld->Log(e.what());
00134             return false;
00135         }
00136     }

00170     //Inherited From ManagerBase
00171     void GraphicsManager::Initialize()
00172     {
00173         this->RenderTimer = new Ogre::Timer();
00174     }
00175 
00176     void GraphicsManager::DoMainLoopItems()
00177     {
00178         //Create a the RenderTimer, which will be used to measure the time
00179 
00180         crossplatform::RenderPhysWorld(this->GameWorld, this->OgreGameWindow);
00181 
00182         //Do Time Calculations to Determine Rendering Time
00183         this->GameWorld->SetFrameTime( this->RenderTimer->getMilliseconds() );
00184         this->RenderTimer->reset();
00185         if(this->GameWorld->GetTargetFrameTime() > this->GameWorld->GetFrameTime()){
00186             FrameDelay++;
00187         }else if(this->GameWorld->GetTargetFrameTime() == this->GameWorld->GetFrameTime()){
00188         }else{
00189             if (0<FrameDelay){
00190                 FrameDelay--;
00191             }else{
00192                 FrameDelay=0;
00193             }
00194         }
00195         crossplatform::WaitMilliseconds( FrameDelay );
00196     }
00197 
00198     ManagerBase::ManagerTypeName GraphicsManager::GetType() const
00199         { return ManagerBase::GraphicsManager; }
00200 
00201     bool GraphicsManager::PostMainLoopItems()
00202     {
00203         this->GameWorld->GetEventManager()->AddEvent(new EventRenderTime(this->GameWorld->GetFrameTime()));
00204         return ManagerBase::PostMainLoopItems();
00205     }

00208     {
00209         OgreGameWindow = OgreWindow;
00210     }
